title: Online English Tutors
job_overview:
???? Job Description
We are seeking enthusiastic and reliable online English tutors to teach students of all ages and proficiency levels. As a tutor, you will conduct 1:1 live video lessons based on the student’s learning goals. You can set your own schedule, hourly rates, and preferred student types.
???? Responsibilities
• Deliver 1-on-1 English lessons via video call (Zoom or platform-based)
• Customize lesson content according to students' needs and goals
• Provide feedback and encouragement to students after each class
• Prepare materials or exercises as needed
• Maintain professional and engaging communication with students
• Record short video intro and maintain profile visibility
? Requirements
• Fluency in English (native or near-native level)
• At least 1 year of teaching/tutoring experience (online or offline)
• Good internet connection, quiet teaching environment, and webcam
• Strong communication and interpersonal skills
• Friendly, patient, and passionate about teaching
• TESOL/TEFL/CELTA certification is a plus but not required
• Bachelor’s degree or currently enrolled in a related program preferred
? Working Hours
• Fully flexible: Set your own availability and working hours
• Minimum commitment: 10 hours per week recommended
???? Compensation
• Set your own hourly rate (USD-based)
???? Benefits
• Work from anywhere, anytime
• Freedom to build your own brand as a tutor
• Supportive admin team and training resources
• Access to international student community
• Zero platform joining fee
________________________________________
???? How to Apply
Please upload the required documents and information during the registration process on Upgrade to see actual info.
